PRIVACY POLICY AND DATA PROTECTION (GDPR/KVKK)


1. Data Controller
 As HeyU ("the App"), we are committed to protecting the personal data of Yeditepe University students. Your data is processed in accordance with the Law on the Protection of Personal Data.


2. Collected Personal Data
 To provide our services, we collect the following information:
 • University email address (@std.yeditepe.edu.tr)
 • Profile information (Name, Age, Major, Bio)
 • User-uploaded photos
 • Interests and hobbies for matching algorithms


3. Purpose of Processing
 Your data is used exclusively for:
 • Facilitating campus-based networking.
 • Verifying university student status.
 • Calculating match scores based on shared interests.
 • Maintaining community safety and moderation.


4. Data Storage and Security
 All communications and profile data are stored securely using Firebase encrypted infrastructure. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.


5. User Rights
 You have the right to request the deletion of your account and all associated data at any time via the "Settings" menu.


By using HeyU, you acknowledge that you have read and agreed to these terms.
